title: BC Error: gRPC panicked! invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
After running fine for some time, this morning I noticed my beacon chain client was giving this error every few seconds:

```
[2019-11-18 07:16:02] ERROR gRPC panicked! error=runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference stack=goroutine 33348817
[running]:
runtime/debug.Stack(0xc0000c4690, 0x14f4e88, 0x5)
        GOROOT/src/runtime/debug/stack.go:24 +0x9d github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/shared/traceutil.RecoveryHandlerFunc(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x12fe120, 0x2248b50, 0x40ef76, 0x10)
        shared/traceutil/recovery_interceptor_option.go:29 +0x155 github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-middleware/recovery.recoverFrom(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x12fe120, 0x2248b50, 0x16b3228, 0x504170, 0xc001c35000)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_middleware/recovery/interceptors.go:52
+0x5a
github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-middleware/recovery.UnaryServerInterceptor.func1.1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0xc0002927f8, 0xc0012e5968)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_middleware/recovery/interceptors.go:26
+0x77
panic(0x12fe120, 0x2248b50)
        GOROOT/src/runtime/panic.go:679 +0x1b2 github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/rpc/validator.(*Server).CommitteeAssignment(0xc000515290,
0x18718c0, 0xc0074cb8c0, 0xc0013cd000, 0xc000515290, 0x0, 0x0)
        beacon-chain/rpc/validator/assignments.go:30 +0x99 github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1._ValidatorService_CommitteeAssignment_Handler.func1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb8c0, 0x146ece0, 0xc0013cd000, 0x1546375, 0x3c, 0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb8c0)
       
bazel-out/k8-py2-fastbuild/bin/proto/beacon/rpc/v1/linux_amd64_stripped/v1_go_proto%/github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1/services.pb.go:1976
+0x86
github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-middleware/tracing/opentracing.UnaryServerInterceptor.func1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x146ece0, 0xc0013cd000, 0xc0003fdb40, 0xc0003fdb60, 0x3, 0x3, 0x187ce60, 0xc001d0fc40)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_middleware/tracing/opentracing/server_interceptors.go:31
+0x165
github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-middleware.ChainUnaryServer.func1.1.1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x146ece0, 0xc0013cd000, 0x3c, 0xc004fb04b0, 0x12, 0x1)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_middleware/chain.go:25 +0x63 github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-prometheus.(*ServerMetrics).UnaryServerInterceptor.func1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x146ece0, 0xc0013cd000, 0xc0003fdb40, 0xc0003fdba0, 0xc0009e2ea0, 0x4311aa, 0xc0009e2ea0, 0xc000b578a8)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_prometheus/server_metrics.go:107
+0xad
github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-middleware.ChainUnaryServer.func1.1.1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x146ece0, 0xc0013cd000, 0x13c8ea0, 0x110f33f, 0x18718c0,
0x20)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_middleware/chain.go:25 +0x63 github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-middleware/recovery.UnaryServerInterceptor.func1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x146ece0, 0xc0013cd000, 0xc0003fdb40, 0xc0003fdbc0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_middleware/recovery/interceptors.go:30
+0xe2
github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-middleware.ChainUnaryServer.func1.1.1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x146ece0, 0xc0013cd000, 0xc0009ebca0, 0xc008966300, 0xc000b579e8, 0x40f7e8)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_middleware/chain.go:25 +0x63 github.com/grpc-ecosystem/go-grpc-middleware.ChainUnaryServer.func1(0x18718c0,
0xc0074cb710, 0x146ece0, 0xc0013cd000, 0xc0003fdb40, 0xc0003fdb60, 0xc000b57a58, 0x503728, 0x13f74e0, 0xc0074cb710)
       
external/com_github_grpc_ecosystem_go_grpc_middleware/chain.go:34 +0xd5 github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1._ValidatorService_CommitteeAssignment_Handler(0x146e560,
0xc000515290, 0x18718c0, 0xc0074cb710, 0xc004fb03c0, 0xc0006def90, 0x18718c0, 0xc0074cb710, 0xc0023b8380, 0x35)
       
bazel-out/k8-py2-fastbuild/bin/proto/beacon/rpc/v1/linux_amd64_stripped/v1_go_proto%/github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/proto/beacon/rpc/v1/services.pb.go:1978
+0x14b
google.golang.org/grpc.(*Server).processUnaryRPC(0xc0001cdb00,
0x18840c0, 0xc001b8c180, 0xc008966300, 0xc0006df2f0, 0x2259cf0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
        external/org_golang_google_grpc/server.go:998 +0x46a google.golang.org/grpc.(*Server).handleStream(0xc0001cdb00, 0x18840c0, 0xc001b8c180, 0xc008966300, 0x0)
        external/org_golang_google_grpc/server.go:1278 +0xd97 google.golang.org/grpc.(*Server).serveStreams.func1.1(0xc001217a50,
0xc0001cdb00, 0x18840c0, 0xc001b8c180, 0xc008966300)
        external/org_golang_google_grpc/server.go:717 +0xbb created by google.golang.org/grpc.(*Server).serveStreams.func1
        external/org_golang_google_grpc/server.go:715 +0xa1


```
Assigning to @terencechain - maybe we can add a nil check for head state there?
Yep! Will work on this today!
